s2.title: Questions or Comments
s2.p: For general questions or comments, write to the &javaparsername;-user mailing list. If you wish to discuss more technical issues or join the Xerces developer community, please subscribe to the &javaparsername;-dev list.
If you are submitting a bug (and bug reports are definitely appreciated!), please provide the following information:

ul.li: Sample XML file that causes the bug
Sample Schema file (if required to recreate the bug)
Sample DTD file (if required to recreate the bug)

s2.p: Please also see the faq entry that covers bug submissions.
